label: Label

brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
testnetLimitMessage: Testnet limit: Maximum {{ amount }} ETH per transaction when bridging from Goliath to Sepolia to prevent abuse of testnet token minting.
bridgeConfirmWarning: By confirming, you agree to bridge your assets. This action cannot be undone.
maximumAmountTestnet: Maximum {{ amount }} ETH per transaction (testnet limit)
pleaseConnectToGoliath: Please connect to the Goliath Testnet.
errorConnectingRefresh: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
expertModeWarning: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
expertModeWarningCapital: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
confirmExpertModePrompt: Please type the word "confirm" to enable expert mode.
expertModeTooltip: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
disableMultihopsTooltip: Restricts swaps to direct pairs only.
slippageToleranceTooltip: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
transactionDeadlineTooltip: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
connectWalletToViewLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
switchToGoliathToViewLiquidity: Please switch to Goliath Testnet to view your liquidity.
waitingForTxMined: Waiting for transaction to be mined...
unableFetchBridgeStatus: Unable to fetch bridge status. The bridge may still be processing - please check again later.
firstLiquidityProvider: You are the first liquidity provider.
ratioWillSetPrice: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
clickSupplyToReview: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
poolTip: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
outputEstimatedRevert: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{slippage}}% your transaction will revert.
transactionTakingLonger: Transaction is taking longer than expected. It may still complete - check your wallet for pending transactions.
